summary: This document contains various financial records and account opening procedures related to LSJE, LLC, including customer due diligence forms, account agreements, and amendments to the company's articles of organization. It highlights the involvement of key individuals in the management and operation of the company, as well as the necessary documentation for compliance with banking regulations. This document contains business verification results for LSJ Employee LLC, including details about tax ID, address, and phone number. It also includes information about inquiries made by FirstBank regarding the business. The document emphasizes compliance with federal regulations regarding consumer reporting. This document is an Amended and Restated Operating Agreement for LSJE, LLC, which was previously named LSJ Employees, LLC. It outlines the structure, management, and operational guidelines for the company, including details about membership units, capital contributions, and indemnification of the sole member, Jeffrey E. Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein is the sole member of LSJE, LLC, and Jeanne Brennan serves as the manager of the company.
Darren Indyke is the attorney for Jeffrey Epstein in matters related to LSJE, LLC.
Harry Beller is the accountant for LSJE, LLC, which is owned by Jeffrey Epstein.
Jeffrey E. Epstein, as the Sole Member, employs Jeanne Brennan as the Manager of LSJE, LLC.

events.title: Name Change of LSJ Employees, LLC to LSJE, LLC

events.title: Formation of LSJ Employees, LLC

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the sole member of LSJE, LLC.
Jeanne Brennan serves as the manager of LSJE, LLC.
Darren Indyke is the attorney for LSJE, LLC.
Harry Beller is the accountant for LSJE, LLC.
The company changed its name from LSJ Employees, LLC to LSJE, LLC on March 13, 2013.
The business LSJ Employee LLC has a Federal Tax ID of 66-0776615.
The address for LSJ Employee LLC is 6100 Red Hook Quarter, 83 St. Thomas, VI 00802.
The document indicates that there were no closures or purchased debts associated with LSJ Employee LLC.
An inquiry was performed by FirstBank on 01/03/2012 regarding LSJ Employee LLC.
The document is marked as confidential and contains consumer/business data in compliance with federal laws.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the Sole Member of LSJE, LLC, which was previously named LSJ Employees, LLC.
The company was organized on October 27, 2011, and the name was changed on March 13, 2013.
Jeanne Brennan is appointed as the Manager of LSJE, LLC.
The document outlines the capital structure and membership rights of the Sole Member.
Gregory R. Francis, the Lieutenant Governor, certified the amendment to the Articles of Organization.
